label: 惣中掟
本: Cities in Medieval Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 44 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 1983
説明文: Many cities drew up charters (sōhūokite 惣中掟) as the basis of their legal structure, or as in Kyoto, where urban unity was not as strong as other cities, communities merely codified local custom (chōchū shikimoku 町中式目). [SS]
